DOC.brief_summary: C8 sciences program is a cognitive training program mainly developed for the students, and the effectiveness is well established. The aim of this trial is to assess clinical efficacy of the program for cognitive rehabilitation of the patients with stroke or brain injury.
DOC.criteria: Participants with stroke or brain injury Cognitive deficits Uncontrolled medical comorbidities Not able to perform outcome measurements Aphasia, which hamper communication Prediagnosed psychological or other neurological disease not relevant to stroke or brain injury
